title: 3 Cuts and You're Out
text:
Markets are pricing in a very dovish and supportive FedA 90.5% chance of a cut on Wednesday is already priced in, according to BloombergI think a cut is likely, but I'm not at a 90% probability -- I'm far lessFor the December meeting, it is 94% priced in that there will be at least one cut -- presumably at this week's meeting -- but there is also ...

description: Don't bet on the Fed to make any further cuts after the third, and start preparing for a hawkish turn.
authors: Don'T Bet On The Fed To Make Any Further Cuts After The Third
Start Preparing For A Hawkish Turn.
